summary: The world is on the brink of going boom boom
descriptionHtml:
[Center] Video
[youtube]Cg-ZAwUw_NM[/youtube]

As usual Discworld alpha trailer
[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]
[/center]

Mod adds 1 spell tome
I will NOT tell you where the tome is, it is way to OP for that
I will tell you if a giant attacks you and seems to have 5000 health and moves 3 times faster than normal, you are in the right area

Spell is only able to be cast if player has Disintegration perk
The spell adds and removes god mode at the beginning and end respectively due to player being able to be killed during it
If the target dies early the spell will still play out
Sometimes the camera gets a bit wonky, tried to iron it all out didn't get it to do it on latest tests
It works indoors as well but due to imagespaces and fog sometimes it looks like nothing is happening
It does not work on dragons, they will not stay locked in the center
author: darren83
